result.title: AML-DL Interpreter - Revised M36
result.description: A Python or C program to translate AML-DL into algebraic relations compatible with AML. Documentation, user manuals, and installation guides will be written as well. Released and revised in three different stages. Initial internal release for consortia at M12.
